name: Digiloi
overview: Digiloi, an all-PETSCII action game by Dr. TerrorZ. A computer weapons ecosystem is about to take over the whole planet. You need to disable the master computer by finding three floppy keys and insert them in the terminal. Jump, run and fire with joystick in port 2. Turn up to enter doorways. Music/FX options. The d64 includes a bonus color-enhanced Commodore Plus/4 version which sadly only has sound if you have a SID card at $fd40. The game was released as part of K&A Plus #12.
